nodes.name: Notes of the Artifact Hunter
nodes.summary: Changes text in two books: "Famed Artifacts of Tamriel" and "Tamrielic lore".

nodes.name: Imperial Intervention
nodes.summary: This big pluginless compilation adds a High Quality (2048) textures for Imperial architecture, furniture, armors and weapons. All textures are seamless and made by hand.Pack includes new meshes for Imperial armors and weapons.All textures

nodes.name: Templar Armor Replacer by Articus
nodes.summary: Replaces Templar Armor with new non-segmented version designed to work with Better Bodies or Robert Bodies.

nodes.name: Ancestor Ghost Reworked by HedgeHog12 and Articus
nodes.summary: Replaces Ancestor Ghost from Symphony with new balanced version with properly made design, lore friendly colors and shapes.

nodes.name: Imperial Armor Replacer
nodes.summary: Replaces Imperial Armor with new non-segmented version designed to work with Better Bodies or Robert Bodies.

nodes.name: Articus 6th House Dagoth - HD Nightmare Retexture 2K
nodes.summary: 6th House was never been so scary and realistic! This mod adds a High Quality (2048) textures for House Dagoth. All textures are fully reworked and Lore friendly.

nodes.name: Magic VFX Retexture by Articus
nodes.summary: This mod adds High Quality (512) animated textures for magic effects. All textures are fully reworked and vanilla friendly.

nodes.name: Splash Races - Widescreen
nodes.summary: This mod adds 10 new Splash screens for Morrowind. They are based on original Bethesda concept art of races.

nodes.name: Articus Various Retextures
nodes.summary: Retextures various stuff of Morrowind.

nodes.name: Fear The Golden Saint - Resource by Articus
nodes.summary: Some HQ models and textures of Golden Saint for modders to use. Variations may be used as a replacer.

nodes.name: Epic Plants
nodes.summary: Replaces textures and models of various flora with HQ quality.

nodes.name: Dangerous Lava and Oil by Articus

nodes.name: Daedric Intervention

nodes.name: Articus Immersive Crystals - Replacer

nodes.name: Articus Mournhold 2K Retexture
nodes.summary: This mod adds High Quality (2048) textures for City of Mournhold. All textures are fully reworked and Lore friendly.

nodes.name: Articus Lavafall Improved - Detailed Dungeons - Mines and Caverns - Caverns Overhaul
nodes.summary: !!! Install this mod ONLY if you're using Detailed Dungeons or Mines & Caverns or Caverns Overhaul !!! This small Morrowind mod contains a new animated model for lavafall and new lava textures 2K.

nodes.name: Articus BN Faces - Replacer
nodes.summary: This is lore friendly pluginless replacer of all standart faces and hairs. It contains good looking models and textures with standart quality resolution (256).

nodes.name: Articus Solstheim Clothes
nodes.summary: Replaces all the default clothing from the Morrowind DLC Bloodmoon with new non-segmented versions designed to work with Better Bodies or Robert Bodies.

nodes.name: Articus Mournhold Clothes
nodes.summary: This is pluginless replacer of all the default clothing from the Morrowind DLC Tribunal with new non-segmented versions designed to work with Better Bodies or Robert Bodies.

nodes.name: Vurt Mournhold Dead trees
nodes.summary: Forgotten replacer for Mournhold dead trees by Vurt. Changes comes after ash storms in Mournhold. Trees are animated.

nodes.name: Articus Old Mournhold and Sewers Retexture 2K
nodes.summary: This mod adds High Quality (2048) textures for Old Mournhold buildings and Sewers.
